author: Lesley Waters
method: Whip the cream with the icing sugar in a bowl until it forms soft peaks when the whisk is removed.  To serve, spoon the cream mixture into a serving glass, place the orange segments on top and drizzle with the maple syrup.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz double cream,  1 tbsp icing sugar,  1 orange, peeled and segmented,  2 tbsp maple syrup
